name: DateSegmentProps
description:
A date segment displays an individual unit of a date and time, and allows users to edit
the value by typing or using the arrow keys to increment and decrement.

onHoverStart.description: Handler that is called when a hover interaction starts.

onHoverEnd.description: Handler that is called when a hover interaction ends.

onHoverChange.description: Handler that is called when the hover state changes.

children.description: The children of the component. A function may be provided to alter the children based on component state.

className.description: The CSS [className](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/className) for the element. A function may be provided to compute the class based on component state.

style.description: The inline [style](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement/style) for the element. A function may be provided to compute the style based on component state.

isHovered.description: Whether the segment is currently hovered with a mouse.

isFocused.description: Whether the segment is focused, either via a mouse or keyboard.

isFocusVisible.description: Whether the segment is keyboard focused.

isPlaceholder.description: Whether the value is a placeholder.

isReadOnly.description: Whether the segment is read only.

isDisabled.description: Whether the date field is disabled.

isInvalid.description: Whether the date field is in an invalid state.

type.description: The type of segment. Values include `literal`, `year`, `month`, `day`, etc.

isHovered.name: isHovered
isHovered.description: Whether the segment is currently hovered with a mouse.

isFocused.name: isFocused
isFocused.description: Whether the segment is focused, either via a mouse or keyboard.

isFocusVisible.name: isFocusVisible
isFocusVisible.description: Whether the segment is keyboard focused.

isPlaceholder.name: isPlaceholder
isPlaceholder.description: Whether the value is a placeholder.

isReadOnly.name: isReadOnly
isReadOnly.description: Whether the segment is read only.

isDisabled.name: isDisabled
isDisabled.description: Whether the date field is disabled.

isInvalid.name: isInvalid
isInvalid.description: Whether the date field is in an invalid state.

type.name: type
type.description: The type of segment. Values include `literal`, `year`, `month`, `day`, etc.

text.name: text
text.description: The formatted text for the segment.

value.name: value
value.description: The numeric value for the segment, if applicable.

placeholder.name: placeholder
placeholder.description: A placeholder string for the segment.

minValue.name: minValue
minValue.description: The minimum numeric value for the segment, if applicable.

maxValue.name: maxValue
maxValue.description: The maximum numeric value for the segment, if applicable.

type.name: type
type.description: The type of hover event being fired.

pointerType.name: pointerType
pointerType.description: The pointer type that triggered the hover event.

target.name: target
target.description: The target element of the hover event.
